synopsis.text: Seunghee is an ordinary high school boy who secretly enjoys cross-dressing and reading BL comics. His desire is to find a partner who will accept this side of him. However, when his classmate Seungtaek sees him on a failed date dressed in women's clothing, Seunghee's secret is exposed. Seungtaek is the model student and class president who seems to live in a different world from school rebel Gyu-bin. Yet there appears to be more to their relationship than meets the eye. Whenever they are alone after school at Gyu-bin's house, the nature of their interactions changes in unexpected ways. Now that Seunghee's sexuality has been revealed at school, it remains to be seen whether he can preserve the ordinary life he cherishes. This Korean web animation explores the intertwining stories of these high school students as they navigate friendship, self-acceptance, and romance.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
